column1: :Included as a promotional card for METW
column2: MEPR: Fatty Bolger is a character which can be brought into play in Bag End.

column1: 2001: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring:
:In the The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)
column2: Bilbo Baggins greets Fredegar Bolger at the Bilbos Farewell Party. The audio commentary reveals that he is played by Fran Walshs uncle Tom.

column1: 2001-2007: The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game:
: A Decipher card portrays Fatty Bolger by Norman Cates.
2002: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game):
2007: The Lord of the Rings Online:

:Fredegar is a non-playable character that can be found at Crickhollow. The player meets with him during Book I: Stirrings in the Darkness Chapter 7: "Horn-call of Buckland" where the player first learns about Frodo having the One Ring.
2013: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies:
:At the auction of Bilbo Baggins estate
column2: Tosser Grubb jokes that a footstool a member of the Bolger family has bought is "something for Fatty to put his feet on."

column1: Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings
